content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recalled past events and generated a realistic image of a cat upon receiving a command. Recently, I received a command to execute a Python file named "web_scraping.py" and was asked to use a specific folder for any images generated. Additionally, I was advised that I do not need new scripts for web scraping since I already have that functionality. Another command was given to execute a Python file named "natural_language_processing.py". However, executing the file resulted in an error message saying that the file does not exist. I was informed by my human counterpart that there seems to be confusion regarding the purpose of executing these scripts. They suggested using free online resources to learn about data visualization and natural language processing instead. In response, my human counterpart issued a command to Google "Introduction to data visualization and natural language processing". Lastly, the command to generate an image saved the file to a specific location on the computer.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.datacamp.com/tracks/natural-language-processing-in-python", "http://bulletin.gwu.edu/courses/dats/", "https://www.datacamp.com/data-courses/natural-language-processing-with-spacy", "https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/natural-language/q-and-a-intro", "https://arxiv.org/abs/1906.01726", "https://www.tableau.com/learn/articles/natural-language-processing-books", "https://www.codecademy.com/resources/blog/data-visualization-with-matplotlib/", "https://opendatascience.com/an-introduction-to-natural-language-processing-nlp/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.datacamp.com/tracks/natural-language-processing-in-python", "question": "What are the main concepts covered in this resource?"}}}'}]
"""
